name: Capture a Network Trace with netsh.exe
description: Detects capture a network trace via netsh.exe trace functionality
false_positives: Legitimate administrator or user uses netsh.exe trace functionality for legitimate reason
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*netsh* AND process.command_line:*trace* AND process.command_line:*start*)`
